  • As we are concerned about our visitor's health, there is water available to drink.
  • You do not need to “clean your palate” with water between each beer, though again you are free to do so.
description: In this tasting we will compare 3 KAGUA beers from the Tokyo Far Yeast Brewing Company with three comparable standard Japanese beers. Mr. Hitoshi, beer ambassador for the Far Yeast company, will be our guide on this journey.
webDescription:
To pursue Japaneseness’s fragrance, KAGUA beer uses Japanese herbs such as Sansho pepper and Yuzu as brewing spices, rare in the world. It is a Japanese ale with the concept of a fragrance that is brightly colored on a Japanese table.

In this tasting we will compare the three KAGUA beers, Blanc, Rouge and Saison, with three more common Japanese beers.

  • KAGUA Blanc is a pale light yellow beer, cloudy with a creamy head.
  • KAGUA Rouge is a rich and full bodied Belgian-style ale with flavor of roasted malt and spicy SANSHO.
  • KAGUA Saison is a fruity and dry farmhouse ale with refreshing yuzu aroma.

We have the honor to welcome Mr. Hitoshi, European beer ambassador for the Far Yeast company, coming over to explain about the brewing and production processes and the thinking of the Far Yeast Company.

The KAGUA logo, like a traditional Japanese family crest, is a symbol of our commitment to the quality of the product. The logo is so simple that it does not interfere with any table scene. And KAGUA is the perfect foil to the refined cuisine that should be the main dining table. Yet, KAGUA’s bottle and label design have a dignified personality, and it is a reflection of our commitment to quality.

title: AnimeCon Quiz 2023
description: The AnimeCon Quiz is back! Can you answer these obscure anime/Japan-related questions?
webDescription: Hosted by several core staff members, we're going to use Kahoot as our Quiz Sytem, so bring your smartphone. Test your knowledge of all things Japan, whether it's pop-culture, history or recent events.
ticketsInfo: Robert van der Veeke - Robert@animecon.nl

title: The AnimeCon 18+ Quiz
description: Can you answer these obscure, ADULT anime/Japan-related questions?
webDescription: Hosted by several core staff members, we're going to use Kahoot as our Quiz System, so bring your smartphone. Test your knowledge of all the more spicy, juicy and adult things in Japan, whether it's pop-culture, history or recent events. Come and join in on the fun.

title: Dutch20 Lecture
description: How to create your character, Dungeon Master tips and tricks. Find out more at our stand, deep in the dungeon of Exp Plaza

title: Shao Dow
description: Brace yourself for a special musical performance! Shao Dow, iconic manga-loving rapper from the UK, will grace our Main Stage for a show you won't want to miss!
webDescription:
Shao Dow is an award winning rapper, manga author and occasional ninja. After studying Shaolin Kung Fu with the monks whilst living in China, he utilised the tenacity and determination learnt from his martial arts training to independently forge his music career. 

Known to rap in both English and Japanese, Shao is hard to define as just a regular artist. He constantly blurs the lines between anime, gaming, martial arts and his own music and has worked with icons such as Sean Schemmel (the voice of Goku - Dragon Ball Z) and featured on the first single from Tech N9ne’s ‘Asin9ne’ album. 

Shao Dow also works on the soundtrack for the Shaggy Ball Z vs One Jump Man animated series with Mashed (over 5 million views), wrote ‘Boy’: a God of War inspired track (over 6 million views),  and wrote the song ’Thunder Roll’ for the game Fortnite.

Expect a high energy live music performance like you’ve never seen before. If a Shonen anime protagonist could rap, it’d probably be something like this. And if you want to meet Shao Dow before or after the performance, you'll be able to find him in the Signing Area as well.

 

 (credit: Hotbox Live Photography)

 (credit: Hotbox Live Photography)

Shao's accomplishments include the following: 
 
Best Live Performer Award Nominated - AIM Independent Music Awards 2022

Hardest Working Artist Award Winner  - AIM Independent Music Awards 2017

Music Artist Of The Year Award Winner  - AME Awards 2017

Find Shao on:
YOUTUBE 
SPOTIFY
INSTAGRAM
TWITTER

title: Voice Actor Q&A
description:
How do voice auditions work? Do you have to be able to do weird voices in order to become a voice actor? How do you prepare for a role? Do you actually like the characters you play? Do you put something of yourself in these characters to make them more relatable?
All these questions and a lot more can be answered on Friday 21:00
webDescription:
Renowned voice actors Rachelle Heger and Laura Post will be hosting a Q&A about Voice acting in Anime and Games and you can ask them anything you want to know about the cool characters they voiced 

or about voice acting in general and how they got in to the work.

Laura and Rachelle have voiced many characters in both Anime and Games in the USA. Both did a voice in Genshin Impact and they all did many other types of voice work like audio books and commercials. 

Discover the world of voice acting and find out it's more than just funny high voices in kids cartoons. Aside from this panel Rachelle en Laura will als be signing prints of their characters and may be persuaded to sign other items.
For more information, kindly check the schedule for signing opportunities and last minute changes.
ticketsInfo: Meer info bij Niels!

title: Miniature Painting
description: Come and learn the basics of painting miniatures at Studio Ginart's workshop!
webDescription:
Gina's a professional miniature painter (with commissions for game stores, game designers and others in her resume) and she often hosts both classes and workshops at various locations, such as her own studio and now at AnimeCon! Do you have a Pile of Opportunity, but no idea where to start? Or have you always been curious about these wonderful hobby, but never had the opportunity to purchase all the necessities? Now's your chance to give it a try! All the materials will be present and during the workshop, Gina will demonstrate so that you can watch her work, as well as do your own painting.

Don't forget to buy a ticket beforehand for only 5 euros at AnimeCon's online ticket booth!


Kom de basis van het mini painting leren bij een workshop van Studio Ginart! Gina is professioneel mini painter (met opdrachten voor spellenwinkels, spellenmakers en particulieren onder haar riem) en ze geeft lessen en workshops op verschillende locaties, zoals in haar eigen studio en nu op AnimeCon! Heb je een Pile of Opportunity maar geen idee waar je moet beginnen? Of ben je altijd benieuwd geweest naar deze mooie hobby maar nog niet de kans gehad om alle spullen aan te schaffen? Dan is nu je kans om het uit te proberen! Alle materialen zijn aanwezig en tijdens de workshop zal Gina een demo geven en kun je zowel live meekijken als ook zelf schilderen.

Vergeet niet vantevoren een kaartje te kopen voor maar 5 euro bij AnimeCon's online ticket booth!
ticketsInfo: Studio Ginart info@studioginart.nl

title: The Red Turtle
description: The film was co-produced by Studio Ghibli and Wild Bunch. Wild Bunch approached the Dutch animator Dudok de Wit in London and convinced him to take on the project. The screenplay was written by Dudok de Wit.
webDescription:
A nameless man set adrift by a storm wakes up on a deserted island. The man finds that the island is rich in resources, finding fresh fruit and water as well as a variety of small animals and a dense bamboo forest, and prepares to leave the island. The man builds a raft from bamboo, and attempts to sail away. However, an unseen sea creature destroys the raft, forcing the man back to the island. Attempting to escape with another raft, his plan is foiled again by the sea creature. Trying a third time his raft is again destroyed, but once in the water he finds a red turtle facing him. The turtle does not harm the man, and the man retreats back to the island.

That evening, the man sees the red turtle crawling on the shore, attempting to go inland. In revenge, he hits the red turtle on the head with a bamboo stick, and pushes it over on its back. After halfway through building another raft, the man starts to feel remorse about leaving the turtle upside down and tries to save the turtle by flipping it over but it's too heavy. He desperately runs to get some water to revive the turtle but realizes that it's dead, and falls asleep next to it. The turtle's shell splits down the middle during the night and to the man's surprise, he sees a woman lying inside of the turtle shell. The man tries to revive her, making a shelter over her to protect her from the sun. When rain hits the island, the woman wakes up. The man notices she has gone, and searches the island for her, finally seeing that she is on the coastline. Giving her his shirt, he eventually sees the woman is wearing his shirt, but she is dragging the now empty turtle shell into the sea and setting it off. The man does the same with his half-built raft. The two soon form a strong and enduring romance.

Some years later, the couple has a son who is a curious boy who finds a glass bottle and learns about his origin. After accidentally falling into a small cavern, the son learns to swim on his own and forms a peculiar relationship with other turtles in the ocean. Growing up, the son grows accustomed to the island. When he goes into the island for fresh water with his bottle, a tsunami hits the island. Though no one is severely hurt, the island's forest is nearly demolished by it. After cleaning up the island and burning the remains of bamboo, the son has a dream of swimming away from the island. He tells his parents that it's time for him to leave their nest as a sign of his growth into full adulthood and he swims away with a trio of green turtles.

The man and the woman spend the rest of their lives on the island, growing old but still much in love with one another. One night the man sees the moon over the ocean for the final time and closes his eyes as the woman immediately realizes his sudden passing and grieves deeply. The next morning she lies next to him with deep sadness, holds the man's hand one last time, and then transforms back into the red turtle and returns to the sea.

The Red Turtle will be screened with the original Japanese soundtrack and Dutch subtitles - even though there isn't much talking in this movie.

Een naamloze man die door een storm op drift is geraakt, wordt wakker op een onbewoond eiland. De man ontdekt dat het eiland rijk is aan hulpbronnen, vindt vers fruit en water, evenals een verscheidenheid aan kleine dieren en een dicht bamboebos, en bereidt zich voor om het eiland te verlaten. De man bouwt een vlot van bamboe en probeert weg te varen. Een onzichtbaar zeedier vernietigt echter het vlot en dwingt de man terug naar het eiland. Als hij probeert te ontsnappen met een ander vlot, wordt zijn plan opnieuw verijdeld door het zeedier. Bij een derde poging wordt zijn vlot opnieuw vernietigd, maar eenmaal in het water vindt hij een rode schildpad tegenover hem. De schildpad doet de man geen kwaad en de man trekt zich terug naar het eiland.

Die avond ziet de man de rode schildpad over de kust kruipen, in een poging landinwaarts te gaan. Als wraak slaat hij de rode schildpad met een bamboestok op de kop en duwt hem op zijn rug om. Halverwege het bouwen van een ander vlot begint de man spijt te krijgen dat hij de schildpad ondersteboven heeft gelaten en probeert hij de schildpad te redden door hem om te draaien, maar hij is te zwaar. Hij rent wanhopig om wat water te halen om de schildpad nieuw leven in te blazen, maar realiseert zich dat hij dood is en valt ernaast in slaap. Het schild van de schildpad splijt 's nachts in het midden en tot verbazing van de man ziet hij een vrouw in het schild van de schildpad liggen. De man probeert haar nieuw leven in te blazen door een beschutting over haar te maken om haar tegen de zon te beschermen. Als de regen het eiland raakt, wordt de vrouw wakker. De man merkt dat ze weg is en zoekt haar op het eiland af, en ziet eindelijk dat ze aan de kust is. Hij geeft haar zijn overhemd en ziet uiteindelijk dat de vrouw zijn overhemd draagt, maar ze sleept het nu lege schildpaddenschild de zee in en zet het af. De man doet hetzelfde met zijn halfgebouwde vlot. De twee vormen al snel een sterke en duurzame romance.

Enkele jaren later heeft het echtpaar een zoon, een nieuwsgierige jongen die een glazen fles vindt en leert over zijn afkomst. Nadat hij per ongeluk in een kleine grot is gevallen, leert de zoon zelfstandig zwemmen en vormt hij een eigenaardige relatie met andere schildpadden in de oceaan. Toen hij opgroeide, raakte de zoon gewend aan het eiland. Als hij met zijn fles het eiland op gaat om vers water te halen, treft een tsunami het eiland. Hoewel niemand ernstig gewond raakt, wordt het bos van het eiland er bijna door verwoest. Nadat hij het eiland heeft schoongemaakt en de overblijfselen van bamboe heeft verbrand, droomt de zoon ervan weg te zwemmen van het eiland. Hij vertelt zijn ouders dat het tijd is dat hij hun nest verlaat als teken van zijn groei naar volwassenheid en hij zwemt weg met een drietal groene schildpadden.

De man en de vrouw brengen de rest van hun leven op het eiland door, oud worden maar nog steeds erg verliefd op elkaar. Op een nacht ziet de man voor de laatste keer de maan boven de oceaan en sluit zijn ogen als de vrouw onmiddellijk zijn plotselinge overlijden beseft en diep treurt. De volgende ochtend ligt ze met diepe droefheid naast hem, houdt nog een laatste keer de hand van de man vast, verandert dan weer in de rode schildpad en keert terug naar de zee.

The Red Turtle wordt vertoond met de originele Japanse soundtrack en Nederlandse ondertiteling - ook al wordt er niet veel gepraat in deze film.

title: Ponyo
description: This year the theme is "Under the Sea" and no anime movie is a better match than the 2008 Studio Ghibli movie Ponyo.
webDescription:
The son of a sailor, 5-year-old Sosuke lives a quiet life on an oceanside cliff with his mother Lisa. One fateful day, he finds a beautiful goldfish trapped in a bottle on the beach and upon rescuing her, names her Ponyo. But she is no ordinary goldfish. The daughter of a masterful wizard and a sea goddess, Ponyo uses her father's magic to transform herself into a young girl and quickly falls in love with Sosuke, but the use of such powerful sorcery causes a dangerous imbalance in the world. As the moon steadily draws nearer to the earth and Ponyo's father sends the ocean's mighty waves to find his daughter, the two children embark on an adventure of a lifetime to save the world and fulfill Ponyo's dreams of becoming human.

We are proud to show this movie with the original Japanese soundtrack and Dutch subtitles.

De 5-jarige Sosuke, de zoon van een zeeman, leidt een rustig leven op een klif aan de oceaan met zijn moeder Lisa. Op een noodlottige dag vindt hij een prachtige goudvis gevangen in een fles op het strand en als hij haar redt, noemt hij haar Ponyo. Maar ze is geen gewone goudvis. Ponyo, de dochter van een meesterlijke tovenaar en een zeegodin, gebruikt de magie van haar vader om zichzelf te transformeren in een jong meisje en wordt al snel verliefd op Sosuke, maar het gebruik van zulke krachtige tovenarij veroorzaakt een gevaarlijke onevenwichtigheid in de wereld. Terwijl de maan steeds dichter bij de aarde komt en Ponyo's vader de machtige golven van de oceaan stuurt om zijn dochter te vinden, beginnen de twee kinderen aan een avontuur van hun leven om de wereld te redden en Ponyo's dromen om mens te worden te vervullen.

Met trots tonen we deze film met de originele Japanse soundtrack en Nederlandse ondertitels.

title: Inu-oh
description:
The most recent movie of Massaki Yuasa known for Ride Your Wave, Mind Game and Lu over the Wall.

Inu-oh is an animated rock opera about a cursed dancer and a blind musician who stun society with electrifying concerts.
webDescription:
Inu-oh is born to an esteemed family but with a unique appearance. The people around him are so horrified by this that they cover every inch of his body with clothing, even his face is hidden behind a mask. One day he meets a young blind biwa player named Tomona. While Tomona plays an intriguing song about confused destiny, Inu-oh discovers that he has an incredible dancing ability. They become inseparable as friends and business partners, using their creative gifts to survive on the fringes of society. They play song after song and slowly but surely become big stars. With his music, Inu-oh enchants his audience and gradually he begins to transform into someone of unparalleled beauty. But why is Tomona blind and why was Inu-oh born with his unique appearance? This film tells the story of the friendship of the two stars, who dance and sing to find out the truth and thus break each other's curse.

We will show Inu-oh with the original Japanese soundtrack and English subtitles.

Inu-oh wordt geboren met een uniek uiterlijk. De mensen om hem heen zijn hierdoor zo ontzet, dat ze elke centimeter van zijn lichaam bedekken met kleding, zelfs zijn gezicht wordt verborgen achter een masker. Op een dag ontmoet hij een jonge blinde biwa speler genaamd Tomona. Terwijl Tomona een intrigerend lied over het verwarde lot speelt, ontdekt Inu-oh dat hij over een ongelooflijk dansvermogen beschikt. Ze worden onafscheidelijk als vrienden en zakenpartners, waarbij zij hun creatieve gaven gebruiken om te overleven aan de randen van de maatschappij. Ze spelen lied na lied en worden langzaam maar zeker grote sterren. Met zijn muziek betovert Inu-oh zijn publiek en geleidelijk aan begint hij te veranderen in iemand van ongekende schoonheid. Maar waarom is Tomona blind en waarom is Inu-oh geboren met zijn unieke uiterlijk? Deze film vertelt het verhaal over de vriendschap van de twee sterren, die dansend en zingend proberen achter de waarheid te komen en zo elkaars vloek te verbreken.

Ride your wave wordt getoond met de oorsprinkelijke Japanese soundtrack en Engelse ondertitels.

title: Ride Your Wave
description: Hinako is a surf-loving college student who has just moved to a small seaside town. When a sudden fire breaks out at her apartment building, she is rescued by Minato, a handsome firefighter, and the two soon fall in love. Just as they become inseparable, Minato loses his life in an accident at sea. Hinako is so distraught that she can no longer even look at the ocean, but one day she sings a song that reminds her of their time together, and Minato appears in the water. From then on, she can summon him in any watery surface as soon as she sings their song, but can the two really remain together forever? And what is the real reason for Minato's sudden reappearance?
webDescription:
A wonderfully hyper-romantic, mystical and summery Japanese animation film about a young student who falls in love with a firefighter and then has to let go of him after his sudden death. About how sublime it is to love someone very much and how you can say goodbye to your great love in a wonderful, fantastically original way.

Minato is a young firefighter who always wants to do the right thing. But meanwhile he dreams of the tall girl with auburn hair, who surfs the waves so effortlessly every day. As free as Hinako feels at sea, she feels clumsy on land. An adorable meet-cute brings them together and a summer of love at the beach follows. It’s their first crush that has all it takes to be forever. Until suddenly all the color disappears from the world. He dies. But in that intense mourning something wonderful happens. The universe is opening up so that they can say goodbye in a magnificent, magical way.

Yuasa Masaaki is one of the most inventive and exciting anime directors around today. With his very recognizable style, somewhere between Pop-art and Gauguin, his humor and his energetic, quirky characters, he is placed in the illustrious list of Miyazaki (Ghibli) and Shinkai (Your Name). In this movie, Yuasa teams up with Reiko Yoshida (A Silent Voice). Her insight into the emotional life of young adults coupled with its dreamy lightness makes it a film that leaves you very happy. Winner of the Best Animated Feature award at Fantasia, Sitges and the Shanghai International Film Festival.

We will show Ride your wave with the original Japanese soundtrack and English subtitles.

Een heerlijk hyperromantische, mystieke en zomerse Japanse animatiefilm over een jonge student die verliefd wordt op een brandweerman en hem vervolgens moet loslaten na zijn plotselinge dood. Over hoe subliem het is om heel veel van iemand te houden en hoe je op een prachtige, fantastisch originele manier afscheid kunt nemen van je grote liefde.

Minato is een jonge brandweerman die altijd het juiste wil doen. Maar ondertussen droomt hij van het lange meisje met kastanjebruin haar, dat elke dag zo moeiteloos over de golven surft. Zo vrij als Hinako zich voelt op zee, voelt ze zich onhandig op het land. Een schattige meet-cute brengt ze bij elkaar en een zomer vol liefde op het strand volgt. Het is hun eerste verliefdheid die alles in zich heeft om voor altijd te zijn. Tot ineens alle kleur uit de wereld verdwijnt. Hij gaat dood. Maar in die intense rouw gebeurt er iets wonderlijks. Het universum gaat open zodat ze op een magnifieke, magische manier afscheid kunnen nemen.

Yuasa Masaaki is een van de meest inventieve en opwindende anime-regisseurs van dit moment. Met zijn zeer herkenbare stijl, ergens tussen Pop-art en Gauguin, zijn humor en zijn energieke, eigenzinnige karakters, wordt hij geplaatst in het roemruchte rijtje van Miyazaki (Ghibli) en Shinkai (Your Name). In deze film werkt Yuasa samen met Reiko Yoshida (A Silent Voice). Haar inzicht in het gevoelsleven van jongvolwassenen in combinatie met de dromerige lichtheid maakt het een film waar je heel blij van wordt. Winnaar van de prijs voor beste animatiefilm op Fantasia, Sitges en het Shanghai International Film Festival.

Ride your wave wordt getoond met de oorsprinkelijke Japanese soundtrack en Engelse ondertiteling.

title: Cosplay Armor & Props: the art of crafting (free materials & live crafting)
description: Discover the art of crafting at this exciting and educational workshop. Each attendee will receive free materials to create their own unique item to take home. In addition, there will be a panel presentation which will give you invaluable insights and tips to develop your skills.
webDescription:
Discover the art of crafting at this exciting and educational workshop. Each attendee will receive free materials to create their own unique item to take home. Along with this hands-on experience, there will be a panel presentation featuring seasoned cosplayer, CaptainGhostly, who will provide invaluable insights and tips to help develop your skills.

Whether you're a beginner or experienced crafter, this panel/workshop is designed to suit all levels.

Don't miss out on this unforgettable experience generously provided by CaptainGhostly and cosplayshop.be!

(Instagram: @captainghostly)
ticketsInfo:
name: Matthias Story
email: captainghostly@gmx.com

title: Periscoop Anime Q & A
description: Periscoop Anime is the distributor that, starting with Your name in 2018, has brought a wave of quality movies to the Netherlands. In this Q & A they want to talk with you about their future plans and they want you to tell them what you hope to see in the Netherlands in the coming years in all media.
webDescription:
Your name, Dragon Ball Broly, Weathering with you, Ride you Wave, Promare, Inu-Oh, Jujutsu Kaisen, several My Hero Academia and One piece movies. You could see these movies in Dutch cinemas thanks to distribution by Periscoop Anime,

The anime industry is growing world wide, but without Periscoop Anime you wouldn't notice much change in the Netherlands.

In this Questions & Answers session, Periscoop will not just announce new titles and tell about their future plans; but they also have questions for you: 

  • What would you want for Anime in the Netherlands?
  • How do you consume most of your Anime?
  • What kinds of Anime do you watch?
  • How do your watch Anime?
  • What are you currently missing in the Netherlands?
  • Do you prefer English or Dutch subtitles?
  • Would you be happier with more series being released on Bluray or DVD?

Visit these Q & A's on Friday and Sunday and talk with the management  or visit the Periscoop Anime stand at the Horeca Plaza throughout the weekend and let them know.

title: Dressing rooms
rules:
Dressing rooms rules

Note, these rooms are strictly changing rooms. 

  • Unattended items will be removed.
  • Leave your bags / suitcases / props at the Cloak / Bag room or risk losing them or being thrown out for littering.
  • Due to privacy reasons, camera's are strictly forbidden inside these rooms.
  • Any attempt at taking a picture of the inside of these rooms (including from the outside) will result in a permanent ban from the convention.
description: Cosplay costumes are not always the easiest thing to wear when going to a convention. Planes, trains and automobiles can be so costume unfriendly and not everyone wants to wear the same costume all day so we do have changing rooms.
webDescription:
Your normal clothes are not the best thing to wear when going to the disco in the evening, but they are pretty comfortable the rest of the day.
We know of these issues and therefore we have dedicated changing rooms, just for you! Here you can comfortably change from one set of clothes to another.

For anyone used to changing in the toilets: yes this is permitted and there is space in to change in the toilets… under the changing room. But AnimeCon has had decent changing rooms for the last 10 years, so  do try them out and keep the toilets available for standard use.

title: Het Duivelsei
description: Het Duivelsei is the student board game association from Leiden, with over 500 board and card games in our collection and many other fun activities. This year you can find us at the AnimeCon 2023 Exp Plaza for some relaxing and fun games.
webDescription:
Join us this weekend to play some board- or card games, or maybe even try playing Magic the Gathering. We've got Munchkin, Coup, Exploding Kittens, and many more games, both easy and difficult,
playtime ranging from fifteen minutes to three hours. Need help with choosing a game or with figuring out the rules? No problem, we are there to help!

This weekend you can also join us for our The Werewolves of Miller's Hollow – Hour, try to come out on top in the Short Games Showdown, or just bring your favorite board game to our stand if you want to play it with us!

Fun Fact: our name, Het Duivelsei (The Devil's egg), is an old name for the one thing that is essential for the Devil's favourite pastime, gambling: dice!

Check out our site for more information about us.

activityType.longDescription: Continuous events at the event plaza

title: Dealer Room Open
description: Vendors from all over Europe and some even farther away will sell their J-POP, anime, manga and cosplay-related merchandise in the Dealer Room. This has always been an important part of our festival and a huge attraction for our guests. It really is the easiest way to shop for anime and manga products in one single spot anywhere in the Benelux countries! The Dealer Room will be open on every day the festival is running.

title: Miatzy Bring & Buy intake
description: Bring your second hand goods to the Miatzy Bring & Buy

title: Miatzy Bring & Buy Pick-up
description: Time to check what Miatzy managed to sell for you, pick up your remaining items and of course, your money!

title: Sebby x Plopper presents: That Time My Plopper and I Got Isekai'd To A Rave
description:
Wow, what is that in the distance? Is that the rumbling sound of a Pinsir? Is that the sound of dancefloor shattering mashups from the East? Or is that Sebby who will be returning for a second time to grace the dancefloor and build a party with a Plopper like never before!

Expect everything from grovy EDM, ground-pounding Techno, floor crushing K-Pop, and crazy mashups from the East that have you raving into the midnight.  So tag along and discover what it would be like to be Isekai'd to an AnimeCon rave!

title: Periscoop Anime
description: Periscoop Anime distributes Anime movies to Dutch cinemas and also sells them on Bluray and DVD. If you visit them on time it is a Slam Dunk they have some free movie posters for you.
webDescription:
Did you like seeing Your name on the big screen in the Cinema. or was Dragon Ball Super: Broly your movie or One piece Stampede or the My Hero Academia movies? The fact that we could finally see these movies in a cinema in the Netherlands was all thanks to Periscoop Anime!

If you missed out on some of these movies, you have a chance to purchase them at their stand. 

Periscoop Anime is interested to hear from you what you would like to see in the near future.

activityType.longDescription: Continuous events at the event plaza

title: Registration Desk
description: At the entrance to the festival is the registration desk. There you can buy tickets at the door, get your free under 7 child badge, your wrist band or entry badge and convention booklets.
webDescription: The registration desk can also help you with general questions about the festival and for some events you can write you name on the participants list.

title: The Pacific War Under the Sea
description: When thinking about submarines during WW II most people think about the battle for the Atlantic. But at the same time in the Pacific another war under the sea was progressing. This military history lecture lifts the reflecting veil of the sea surface and the distorting veil of history, to tell what happened under the sea!
webDescription:
Why was the Japanese submarine fleet so ineffectual during the pacific war? Or was it? A few Japanese coastal raids on the mainland US provoked the internment of Japanese Americans, the infamous Executive Order 9066. And would the Japanese aircraft carrying i-400 submarines have been able to turn the tide?

The Germans fixed their torpedo problems within months of them becoming known while the Americans took years. Then how did the U.S. Navy successfully cause a famine on the Japan home islands, while the Germans failed to isolate Britain just a few years earlier? Does this story have anything to do with the reason an American submarine “sank” a Japanese train?

This talk will address these issues, using a collection of tall tales from under the Pacific surface.

title: LFG: Bring-Your-Own-Board-Game-Night
description: Looking for group? Make new friends, play board games at the Exp Plaza. Good old-fashioned fun guaranteed!
webDescription:
AnimeCon is all about experiencing new things and enjoying shared interests with likeminded souls. 
What better way to make new friends than by playing games with (or against) them!


From 22:00 onward on Friday and Saturday night, meet up at the Exp Plaza to find groups looking for more players, or bring along your own game to have others join you!
Pick a seat near the Exp Plaza entrance if you are still looking for players, and then find a cosy spot at one of the available playing/chilling spots on the Exp Plaza to start playing your games.
Bring a game from home that has been collecting dust, link up your Nintendo Switches, or grab your phones to play one of the many free online party games in existence with a group. 


Will there be any settlers? Will there be any Cards Against Humanity? Will kittens be exploded?

Bring your own if you want to make sure!

There is only one rule: Have fun ^^

title: The Japanese Whisky Bar
rules:
• Drunk people will be removed.
  • Glassware may not be removed from the event room.
  • Drinking whisky as if it was a shot is not allowed.
description: Last year it was a try-out event, but this year it's back with a few more and different whiskies, more stories and a bit more knowledge and your favourite grumpy barman! The Japanese Whisky Bar, now on Friday and Saturday night!
webDescription:
Drink award winning Japanese single malt, Japanese and world blended malt and Japanese and World whisky Blends at AnimeCon this year!

Niels will bring a curated selection of his hidden stash (We still think he is a grumpy old dragon) of Japanese whiskies for all of you to enjoy. This year, he will have someone to assist him in pouring whisky so it should all be quite a bit faster than last year.

Niels's collection has obviously increased, again, and he will bring a nice selection to Rijswijk this year. Think of a Nikka whisky blended by Takatsuru himself! One of the nicest old Suntory whiskies, whiskies from small distilleries like Saburomaru and Nagahama.

Whiskies from his favourite distilleries, Mars Tsunuki and Komagatake, whiskies from the 70's, 80's and brand new whiskies. We have whiskies for every price point, so everyone can enjoy them.

Niels will also bring a 5 year old Umeshu cask matured whisky from Akashi and, as bonus, the cask strength (25%ABV) Umeshu that was previously in the cask the whisky aged in for two years.

As this is a whisky bar, we will kindly request you to show that you are older than 18 and that you understand that the whiskies are all served neat and drinking them as a shot is not appreciated.

We will do our best to have small snacks available too. Payment can be in Cash or with Tikkie. 

Please note that due to scheduling conflicts, the bar may open a bit late.

title: Weerwolven
description:
The evening has fallen and a sinister howling can be heard in the distance. Join us Friday or Saturday evening for some classic Werewolves of Miller’s Hollow.
---
De avond valt en een sinister gehuil klinkt uit de verte. Sluit bij ons aan op vrijdag- of zaterdagavond voor wat klassieke Weerwolven van Wakkerdam.
webDescription:
May you survive the werewolves attacks… or succeed in eating all the villagers.

Werewolves of Miller’s Hollow will be available on Friday and Saturday evening from 19:00 until 21:00. Games will be held in Dutch and English.

Moge je de weerwolven aanvallen overleven… of er in slagen alle dorpelingen op te eten.

Weerwolven van Wakkerdam zal beschikbaar zijn op vrijdag- en zaterdagavond van 19:00 tot 21.00. De spellen zullen zowel in het Engels als in het Nederlands gehouden worden.

rules:

description: This workshop explains how to make your own fruit tea or a milk bubble tea.

title: NDXJCL presents UNMUTED
description: UNMUTED is an event project hosted by Neodash Zerox (also known from Deshima Sounds), which has a focus on awesome music, but an even heavier focus on its artists and community members under Neodash's "NDXJCL" brand.
webDescription:
While most of its members are supporters of the heavier styles of Dance music within the weeb culture, it's not exclusive to only those styles. For AnimeCon, UNMUTED will go through the styles which reflect what it stands for. As community is key within NDXJCL, the experienced Neodash brings along his protégé and newcomer to the scene: ImDaBanana.

Neodash Zerox is a freestyle artist from The Netherlands. With DJ experience since 2005 and a love for Electronic Dance Music since the early 90s, any DJ sets he hosts can go all the way from happy to hard and slow to fast. What he will play is always a surprise, even for him. Depending on the situation, he will adapt. One thing is for sure: expect a freestyle variety experience, as diversity is key!

Next to being a DJ, he is also a streamer of music talkshows J-Core Life on a weekly base and rAmen Break / Gabberdisco Night Live every month. Every now and then he also organizes multi hour livestream events, showcasing other artists under his #NDXJCL banner.

ImDaBanana is a multi genre DJ and producer with influences from many different kinds of club music. With a wide range of flavors of music available in his arsenal, he's sure to have something to make you dance. 

Expect a wild ride from both these artists as they bring along music that brought their community together. In the end, you might even want to join the tribe!

Socials and links: http://jcore.life

title: Custom FX
description: Come take a look at Core Focus Photography for all kinds of tips and tricks! From model directing, photography and LEDs for your cosplay!
webDescription:
Custom FX

How do you incorporate LEDs in your outfit? What do you need to take into account? What kind of materials can you use? Visit our booth at the Exp Plaza and get answers to all your LED questions. You can participate in a fun workshop in which you will get hands-on in working with LEDs, LED strips and other electronics. You will get instructions on what to do and will then be able to start working on the exercises. NO programming experience required.

Custom FX

Hoe werk je met LEDs in je Outfit of in je prop? Waar moet je rekening mee houden? Welke materialen heb je nodig? Bezoek onze stand van Custom FX op de Exp Plaza. We geven antwoord op al je vragen. Ook kun je meedoen aan een leuke workshop waarbij je zelf aan de slag gaat met het aansluiten van LEDs, LED strips en andere elektronica. Je krijgt hierbij een korte uitleg per onderwerp waarna je zelf aan de slag gaat om de opdracht te maken. Geen programmeerkennis nodig.
